class.name: Chemicals
Paints
Cosmetics and cleaning preparations
class.description: Bleaching preparations and other substances for laundry use; cleaning, polishing, scouring and abrasive preparations; soaps; perfumery, essential oils, cosmetics, hair lotions; dentifrices.

class.name: Lubricants and fuels
class.description: Industrial oils and greases; lubricants; dust absorbing, wetting and binding compositions; fuels (including motor spirit) and illuminants; candles, wicks.

class.name: Pharmaceuticals
Metal goods
Machinery
class.description: Machines and machine tools; motors and engines (except for land vehicles); machine coupling and transmission components (except for land vehicles); agricultural implements other than hand-operated; incubators for eggs

class.name: Hand tools
class.description: Hand tools and implements (hand operated); cutlery; side arms; razors.

class.name: Electrical and scientific apparatus
Medial Apparatus
class.description: Surgical, medical, dental and veterinary apparatus and instruments, artificial limbs, eyes and teeth; orthopedic articles; suture materials.

class.name: Environmental control apparatus
class.description: Apparatus for lighting, heating, steam generating, cooking, refrigerating, drying, ventilating, water supply and sanitary purposes

class.name: Vehicles
class.description: Vehicles; apparatus for locomotion by land, air or water.

class.name: Firearms
class.description: Firearms; ammunition and projectiles; explosives; fireworks.

class.name: Jewelry
class.description: Precious metals and their alloys and goods in precious metals or coated therewith, not included in other classes; jewelry, precious stones;

class.name: Musical Instruments
class.description: Musical Instruments.

class.name: Paper goods and printed matter
Rubber Goods
class.description: Rubber, gutta-percha, gum, asbestos, mica and goods made from these materials and not included in other classes; plastics in extruded form for use in manufacture; packing, stopping and insulating materials; flexible pipes, not of metal

class.name: Leather Goods
class.description: Leather and imitations of leather, and goods made of these materials and not included in other classes; animal skins, hides; trunks and traveling bags; umbrellas, parasols and walking sticks; whips, harness and saddlery

class.name: Nonmetallic building materials
class.description: Building materials (nonmetallic); nonmetallic rigid pipes for building; asphalt, pitch and bitumen; nonmetallic transportable buildings; monuments, not of metal.

class.name: Furniture and articles not otherwise classified
class.description: Furniture, mirrors, picture frames; goods (not included in other classes) of wood, cork, reed, cane, wicker, horn, bone, ivory, whalebone, shell, amber, mother-of-pearl, meerschaum and substitutes for all these materials, or of plastics.

class.name: Housewares and glass
class.description: Household or kitchen utensils and containers (not of precious metal or coated therewith); combs and sponges; brushes (except paint brushes); brush-making materials; articles for cleaning purposes; steel wool; un-worked or semi-worked glass (except glass used in building); glassware, porcelain and earthenware not included in other classes.

class.name: Cordage and fibers
class.description: Ropes, string, nets, tents, awnings, tarpaulins, sails, sacks and bags (not included in other classes); padding and stuffing materials (except of rubber or plastics); raw fibrous textile materials.

class.name: Yarns and threads
class.description: Yarns and threads, for textile use

class.name: Fabrics
class.description: Textiles and textile goods, not included in other classes; bed and table covers

class.name: Clothing
class.description: Clothing, footwear, headgear

class.name: Fancy goods
class.description: Lace and embroidery, ribbons and braid; buttons, hooks and eyes, pins and needles; artificial flowers

class.name: Floor coverings
class.description: Carpets, rugs, mats and matting, linoleum and other materials for covering existing floors; wall hangings (non-textile).

class.name: Toys and sporting goods
class.description: Games and playthings; gymnastic and sporting articles not included in other classes; decorations for Christmas trees.

class.name: Meats and Processed Foods
class.description: Meat, fish, poultry and game; meat extracts; preserved, dried and cooked fruits and vegetables; jellies, jams, fruit sauces; eggs, milk and milk products; edible oils and fats.

class.name: Staple Foods
class.description: Coffee, tea, cocoa, sugar, rice, tapioca, sago, artificial coffee; flour and preparations made from cereals, bread, pastry and confectionery, ices; honey, treacle; yeast, baking-powder; salt, mustard; vinegar, sauces (condiments); spices; ice.

class.name: Natural Agricultural Products
class.description: Agricultural, horticultural and forestry products and grains not included in other classes; living animals; fresh fruits and vegetables; seeds, natural plants and flowers; foodstuffs for animals, malt.

class.name: Light beverages
class.description: Beers; mineral and aerated waters and other nonalcoholic drinks; fruit drinks and fruit juices; syrups and other preparations for making beverages.

class.name: Wine and Spirits
class.description: Alcoholic beverages (except beers).

class.name: Smoker's articles
class.description: Tobacco; smokers' articles; matches.

class.name: Advertising and business
class.description: Advertising; business management; business administration; office functions.

class.name: Insurance and Financial
class.description: Insurance; financial affairs; monetary affairs; real estate affairs.

class.name: Building construction and repair
class.description: Building construction; repair; installation services.

class.name: Transport and storage
class.description: Transport; packaging and storage of goods; travel arrangement.

class.name: Treatment of materials
class.description: Treatment of materials

class.name: Education and entertainment
class.description: Education; providing of training; entertainment; sporting and cultural activities

class.name: Computer, scientific and legal
class.description: Scientific and technological services and research and design relating thereto: industrial analysis and research services; design and development of computer hardware and software; legal services

class.name: Hotels and Restaurants
class.description: Services for providing food and drink; temporary accommodations.

class.name: Medical, beauty and agricultural
class.description: Medical services; veterinary services; hygienic and beauty care for human beings or animals; agriculture, horticulture and forestry services

class.name: Personal
class.description: Personal and social services rendered by others to meet the needs of individuals; security services for the protection of property and individuals
